iiv.filter

Class FlipFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.image.ImageFilter
      • iiv.filter.FlipFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Mapping2D, ImageConsumer, ImageProducer, Cloneable

    public class FlipFilter
extends ImageFilter
implements ImageProducer, Mapping2D
    FlipFilter sits between an ImageProducer and ImageConsumer swapping pixels horizontally or vertically.
    Since:
    iiV1.0
    See Also:
    ImageFilter, ImageProducer, ImageConsumer

    • Field Summary
